caption.title: SD Bioline Dengue Duo NS1 test results stratified according to anti-DENV IgG status.
caption.p: Acute phase serum samples from 92 patients with a PCR-confirmed DENV infection were categorized according to their anti-DENV IgG status as defined by DENV IgG IIFT. (A) Tabular representation of subgroup characteristics. Ct: threshold cycle, dpo: days post onset of symptoms. (B) DENV IgG IIFT negative samples (N = 24), (C) DENV IgG IIFT positive samples (N = 68). Samples were stratified according to sampling day d (post onset of symptoms) and Ct-value (categories low (≤ 28.0), medium (28.0 < Ct ≤ 33.0), high (Ct > 33.0) indicated by dashed lines). Open/filled circles represent negative/positive NS1 test results. Absolut sample numbers (n positives / N samples in category) and percentages are displayed. ***: p < 0.001, ****: p < 0.0001.
